page.title: 13RELIGION NONCONFORM/CHURCH
page.content: In the most populated area of the grid there are 4 principal places of worship. The 2 Presbyterian chapels are called Gorffwysfa & Minffordd chapels. Gorffwysfa was built in 1880 and has 102 members. There are 62 members in Minffordd(b.1871). The third place of worship is the Congregational chapel, Carmel,(40 members). The Church in Wales is called TRINITY CHURCH and has 135 members. 60 children attend Sunday School. Communion is celebrated by the vicar, Mr Eric Williams, every Sunday. Non alcoholic wine + wafers. April 28, 1985, was a special day for Gorffwysfa chapel. The Gee medal was presented to Mrs Mattie Griffith, Perthi (86 yrs old) to acknowledge her faithful attendance at Sunday School over a number of years.
